'''Offering Systems''' are game systems in ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' that take items found through [[Exploration]] in exchange for rewards. They are similar to [[Statue of The Seven]] but instead of being able to offer one item at a time, the player automatically offers all in [[Inventory]].

==Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude==
{{Main|Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude}}
Available when interacting with the [[Frostbearing Tree]] in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].<br>
{{Transclude|Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude|Rewards}}

==Sacred Sakura's Favor==
{{Main|Sacred Sakura's Favor}}
Available when interacting with the [[Sacred Sakura]] on [[Narukami Island]], [[Inazuma]].<br>
{{Transclude|Sacred Sakura's Favor|Rewards}}

==Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant==
{{Main|Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant}}
Available when interacting with [[Jinwu]] in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]], [[Liyue]].<br>
{{Transclude|Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant|Rewards}}

==Vanarana's Favor==
{{Main|Vanarana's Favor}}

{{Transclude|Vanarana's Favor|Rewards}}

{{Main|The Gift of Amrita}}
